data.sentence: The word مَعَكُمْ comes from the root م ع and is associated with the meanings: With

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قَالَ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word كَلَّا comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: to go, go away, depart, take away or go away with, consume, receive, pass along, die, be ended.Opinion, belief, way of action, rite. Hold an opinion, follow the opinion of, hold a belief, adapt an opinion.Gold.
data.sentence: The word فَاذْهَبَا comes from the root ذ ه ب and is associated with the meanings: to go, go away, depart, take away or go away with, consume, receive, pass along, die, be ended.Opinion, belief, way of action, rite. Hold an opinion, follow the opinion of, hold a belief, adapt an opinion.Gold.
The word مُسْتَمِعُونَ comes from the root س م ع and is associated with the meanings: to hear, hearken, listen.
